headline: Can I Rely on Dividends for Life After Quitting My Job?
summary: Relying on dividend income for life is possible for many, but it could require a large initial investment.  Potential strategies to minimize these risks include diversification and investing in stocks and funds with solid track records of dividend increases.  One of the top ways people fulfill this dream is by investing in dividend stocks.
